item.title: Javascript Basics: Arrays!
item.description: HeyðŸ‘‹ there, in this mini-tutorial we are going to go through what is an array, how to create one, learn how to grab items from it, learn how to add items to it and much more! Stay tuned! I highly advise you to follow along, Javascript is a browser language, and you can follow along right here! In your browser! To do that: Right click anywhere on this page, then click "
